course_title: Clerkship in Laboratory Medicine and Infection Prevention and Control

sections.comments: Completion of PATH 427, PATH 467 and PATH 477 required.  For students pursuing the Infection Prevention and Control Certificate.Email infectioncontrol@pathology.ubc.ca for information.
instructors: in one of these categories: ACES

description: May involve attendance at an approved institution and/or a project assigned by the instructor(s). Instructor permission required. Enrolment may be limited.
